availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky sheriff and farmer. Married Emma Hansford Middleton. Father of Henry Middleton, John Middleton, Sue Middleton, Thomas Middleton, and Mary Middleton. Held seven slaves in 1860. Lincoln County Sheriff in 1861.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, District 2, p. 306. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Crab Orchard, p. 79. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1847-1911, Ancestry, Births, Lincoln County, 1856. Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates, Ancestry 1913, file no. 16712. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, p.24. KYR-0001-004-1301.
